Power Geospatial

A portfolio.

Devin Power, PE (MN, ND)

I am a professional water resources engineer with more than a decade of experience designing, permitting, and inspecting public infrastructure projects.

I am currently a full-time student, studying Geographic Information Science through the online Masters of Science program at Northwest Missouri State University and Software Engineering through Launch School's Core Curriculum JavaScript Track.

This site is my little corner of the internet to show off what I've learned from those two programs, and (with luck!) provide web-based tools that solve practical problems. Check out my projects below.

MnDOT Bid Price Dashboard

An interactive dashboard for exploring historic bid item prices.

Launch Dashboard More Information

Engineering Project Map

A web map highlighting the engineering projects I've contributed to, and my role on each.

MN Stormwater Regulation Map

A web map that allows for rapid discovery of the water resources near and stormwater regulation landscape of a given project location in MN.
